summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4657 for the improvement of the alley in block 121, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Minor Avenue and Summit Avenue from Madison Street to Marion Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54086, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
